context.content: "Spirited Away" is a Japanese animated fantasy film directed by Hayao Miyazaki. The story follows a young girl named Chihiro who becomes trapped in a mysterious and magical world after her parents are transformed into pigs. She must navigate this strange realm and work at a bathhouse run by a witch in order to save her family and find her way back home. The film features a variety of unique and memorable characters, including Chihiro, Haku, and the enigmatic witch Yubaba.
